A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's either the length or the reliance on a single plot thread that stretches from beginning to end that makes this movie so achingly dull. The misplaced humour breaks up some of the tedium but it comes at the expense of cheapening some potentially serious story themes. Several characters could have used more attention.  

That said\, the visuals are on point and appear technically sound.  

A big disappointment for both fans and casual acquaintances of the franchise.
